channel.title: TGaceAllStories
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from TGaceAllStories, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Home prices fell, but the peak spring selling season was still weak. What’s next?
item.description: Builder KB Home cut its outlook for sales, profitability and home prices, as affordability and worries about the economy are keeping demand weak.

item.title: Are annuity fees worth it? Or should I just keep withdrawing money from my savings?
